options: ['in Nevada', 'across two states', 'far from Lake Mead', 'in Las Vegas']
questions: According to the text, the Hoover Dam lies   _  .
article:
Mini   Hoover Dam Tour
ONLY $48 per person  LIST PRICE $60
This tour begins with beautiful sights as you travel by coach   through famous Las Vegas towards Boulder City, Nevada. As you leave Boulder City on your way to the famous Hoover Dam, you will see in the distance Lake Mead. Created by the Hoover Dam, it is one of the largest and most beautiful man-made lakes in America!
When you arrive at Hoover Dam, you can visit the museum, watch a movie on the Dam's construction and see Oskar J.W. Hansen's famous sculptures on the Nevada side.
Experience the excitement of this man-made wonder with great views that will create memories of a lifetime!
Tour Highlights  
* Free hotel-to-hotel pick-up and drop-off
* Coaches with windows for your viewing pleasure
* Beautiful views of man-made Lake Mead
* Experience the Hoover Dam from two states
* Hoover Dam Discovery Tour
* Time for souvenir   shopping
* Relax and enjoy our return journey by coach to Las Vegas
